programs.show_description: Private railway companies in Greater Tokyo are redeveloping areas along their lines - see how they are focusing on community growth over more traditional developer-led models.
NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.
Flora is integral to traditional and modern Kyoto life - as Japan's oldest public botanical garden celebrates its centennial, a medicinal plant garden preserve rare plants for posterity.

Japanese culture is in the global spotlight like never before - dive into the work of international scholars exploring Japan in bold original ways and uncovering unique perspectives and deep insights.

Dig deeper into current affairs with cutting-edge information and critical analysis on important issues confronting Japanese lives.
This programme gives you comprehensive coverage of events in Japan and Asia, explaining the day's developments and what is behind them.
An in-depth interview programme featuring professionals or experts in the world who share their unique insights, information and analysis.

Nira, with its garlic-like pungency and ability to boost stamina, is a true star; visit a production site to marvel at nira's vitality and see how the ingredient can be used in a wide range of dishes.
Night on the Town: A full moon shines above a bustling neighbourhood - featured prominently are kabuki theatres on hiatus, but people have still come out to take in the nightlife.
Stories about people, stories about life - intimate portraits of people from around Japan, each leading diverse lives while enriching the lives of others.
Onigiri are becoming a global phenomenon - colourful new styles are generating a buzz on social media and convenience stores continue to develop new products. We investigate the latest developments.
